org.fhaes.FHRecorder.view

Class GraphPanel

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.awt.Component
      • java.awt.Container
        • javax.swing.JComponent
          • javax.swing.JPanel
            • org.fhaes.FHRecorder.view.GraphPanel
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.awt.image.ImageObserver, java.awt.MenuContainer, java.io.Serializable, javax.accessibility.Accessible

    public class GraphPanel
extends javax.swing.JPanel
    GUI_GraphPanel Class. Displays graphs for color bars and other statistics.
    Author:
    Cody Calhoun, Anthony Messerschmidt, & Seth Westphal
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

    • Method Detail

      • setZoomLevel

        private void setZoomLevel(int zoomlevel)
        Set the level of zoom from 1 to 20. Integers outside this range are ignored. The zoom level * 10 is the number of categories shown on the graph.
        Parameters:
        index -

      • refreshCharts

        public void refreshCharts(boolean savePosition)
        Refreshes the data in the charts and their position.
        Parameters:
        savePosition - keeps the current scroll bar position and position of the graphs if true, sets to 0 if false.

      • setChartsFirstCategoryIndex

        public void setChartsFirstCategoryIndex(int index)
        Sets the first category index of the chart.
        Parameters:
        index - the index to set the first category of the chart to.

      • setZoom

        private void setZoom()
        Set the zoom level on the graphs. This also handles changing the labels on the axis to avoid collisions.

      • showCustomizeWindow

        private void showCustomizeWindow()
        Shows the customization window.
